attributes.review: so i downloaded this app and then my sister came into the room and asked me if i saw her pet camel so i told her no. then she attacked me but it was okay because my toe was purple. then my mom spilled her meatloaf on her laptop and forced me to clean the milk. so i went outside and took the neighbors dog and used him to kill the fly on the ceiling. so in conclusion, sandwiches are gross if the tiger says so and the pandas dont eat macaroni. obviously this app is the source of all my problems.
attributes.title: GUT RETCHING DISGUSTING TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: This app will make you do the chicken dance until you are physically and mentally tired of dancing. My husband got it and he is unable to Whip OR Nae Nae. Don’t even get me started on the fact that it makes my phone call Little Caesar’s and ask for the phone number of Pizza Hut. THE EMBARRASSMENT. Not to mention When I open it it changed my lock screen to Donald Trump in a Nicki Minaj outfit including a Pink Wig. I am astonished. I WILL NOT STAND BY AN APP THAT CAUSES THIS EMBARRASSMENT FOR OUR BELOVED PRESIDENT.
attributes.title: Worst app of our generation

attributes.review: first, this app fed asparagus to my dog, causing it to turn into a venomous snake that attacked my wife and children while I was out at a 100 gecs concert. I returned home to find them screaming in agony as this app literally consumed them alive. even though there isn’t a 0 star option, this app gets the 1 star I’m giving it because my family didn’t like 100 gecs. now the world is a tiny percent cooler😎😋
attributes.title: this app ate my wife and children

attributes.review: This app will give you ligma! So I went to sleep to see my pet blanket went to the store and came back with a cardboard cutout of trump and I, of course, jumped out of bed to punish my pet blanket for doing this to me! After that I went to get some food and i wondered why chick-fil-a was open on a Sunday but, I wasn’t complaining so I went to get food and that same cardboard cutout of trump was the employee. In conclusion, don’t ever get this app!
attributes.title: Horrible App!

attributes.review: This app is very slow and very glitchy. Not only did the app run slowly, but it also made my phone run slower as well. The app crashes constantly, and I can’t go 3 minutes without a notification popping up. It also repeats notifications all the time and won’t let me clear them. It drained my phone battery quicker than trump could drain the swamp. Terrible!
attributes.title: So glitchy!

attributes.review: This app told me I was adopted. I asked my mom about it and she finally told me the truth after 23 years!!!! 23 years!!!!???? This is the worst app ever. Does not connect to Bluetooth and won’t let me search nearby restaurants!!!! Do not waste your money!!!!!!! It also stepped on my dogs paw and REFUSED to apologize!!!!! If I could give it zero stars I would!!!! Literally has nothing to do with Ronald McDonald!!!! FALSE ADVERTISEMENT!!!!! If I eated soap no I didn’t yes I did bc I didn’t!!!! No. ❤️
attributes.title: Really!!!!!

attributes.review: Don’t get this app unless you want immediate diarrhea. The second I downloaded this app all of my fingernails fell off and I had painful explosive poo that continued for hours. I DONT recommend this for anyone. I’m shocked our president would make an app that would put anyone in so much pain and embarrassment. If you have this, delete it. The poo explosions come later for some so if you plan on keeping this app, be prepared to clean.
attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.review: I crashed like 10 times😤😤and when I did get in, made my whole device glitch😡🤬🤬and it made my device get so many bugs.😤😤 Absolutely waste of my time.😡🤬🤢 WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS PIECE OF DISGUSTING DOODOO💩🤮🤬. Don’t even bother going into the app and even looking at it🤮, it wouldn’t even work if you did🤡🤬😤. The developer🤡✨🤬should just give up and delete this💩💩✨, don’t waste your precious.🥱😤🤬 I WARNED YOUUUUU😤😤😡!!! WOULD RATE ZERO IF POSSIBLE!!🤡🤮🤢🤬✨😡🥱!! Ewwwwww.🤮🤡😤
attributes.title: 🥱🤢🤮🤡 WORST USELESS APP EVER!!!!🤬🤢🤮😤

attributes.review:
I thought this was going to be a reliable app🤨 I really had high hopes upon downloading.

 HOWEVER, I downloaded and immediately upon opening the Trump app I was shown a picture of...you guessed it...LIN MANUEL MIRANDA 😭😭😭 I THINK YOU KNOW WHAT PICTURE I AM REFERRING TO 😭 

I gasped. I had to take a refreshing sip of the Diet Dr. Pepper that I had saved up for when I woke up from my afternoon slumber. Immediately I fell into a deep depression. I have been in bed, paralyzed, for 3 days now. I miss my wife.
attributes.title: one word: WTFFFFFF MY DAWG

attributes.review: I downloaded this app expecting great things. What I got was a whole lot of garbage! When I downloaded the app, my battery life started to deplete at a rapid rate and it appears it’s using my data information for something! My phone’s camera and all other apps I have on my phone also seem to randomly open up ever since I downloaded it!! DO NOT GET THIS APP!! IT WILL RUIN YOUR PHONE AND COMPLETELY DESTROY YOUR PRIVACY!!!
attributes.title: Horrible App!! Probably Ruined My Phone!!
